about.description:
Architecturally inspiring, Oskar is a luxury rental property designed by CetraRuddy.
Serene and peaceful, the lobby reflects more the sensibilities of an art gallery than a residential building as it boasts an impressive collection of work by Phillip Michaels. A sculpture garden and sky-lit reflective pond house a glistening, mirror-polished sculpture by the renowned artist, Arik Levy. And as abundant light pours in from the sundrenched corridors, the elements of this lobby come together to create a space that is both grand and intimate. Oskar Luxury Apartments is an apartment community located in New York County and the 10036 ZIP Code. This area is served by the New York City Geographic District # 2 attendance zone.
about.title: Oskar Luxury Apartments
Unique Features: Luxury Lounge Perfect For Remote Work

transportation.description: Transportation options available in New York include 34 St-Hudson Yards, located 0.6 mile from Oskar Luxury Apartments. Oskar Luxury Apartments is near LaGuardia, located 8.9 miles or 19 minutes away, and Newark Liberty International, located 13.6 miles or 18 minutes away.
